markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Minor Omen](/Feats.aspx?ID=4068) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 82</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Oatia Skysage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4064)

**Trigger**
You fail a Reflex save.

**Requirements**
You can see the night sky.

</column>

---

The stars warn you of danger in the nick of time. Reroll the failed save and use the new result.
name: Minor Omen
requirement: You can see the night sky.
requirement_markdown: You can see the night sky.
